question: Arabic language
answer:
QUESTION

Assalaamu Alaikum Wa Rahmatullahi Wa Barakaatuh

Respected Ulamaa,

                                       I most sincerely appreciate the various informative questions and answers that are mailed to me.May Allah Azza Wa Jal reward all the Ulamaa-e-Kiraam for their tireless efforts.

However,I have been observing that the Arabic Text (Ibaarat) is not visible at all,especially when one would like to peruse the references and the Kutub concerned.Kindly advise me in this regard.Do I have to make certain(software) adjustments on my computer?

ANSWER


Share:

In the name of Allah, Most Gracious, Most Merciful

Assalaamu `alaykum waRahmatullahi Wabarakatuh

 

You need to have arabic font enabled on your Windows. Kindly contact your local Computer Specialist or saleman to help you with it.
